alert.note: Alert for Charleston (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 18 at 12:36AM EST until December 18 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Charleston County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Even higher winds will be possible on the elevated bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
